long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video filters for video hosting sites such as YouTube and Vimeo using WebAssembly technology. Analyze color information for videos straight from the browser using a simple popup that displays various scopes such as Lumascope, Vectorscope, and more! No need to download the video or install heavy video scope software anymore, since you can do it straight from the browser.
